extendedInfo.description: Candlestix is the best way to keep an eye on the markets. Access all these powerful features in an instant:+ View a stock in 1 minute (delayed), 5 minute(delayed), daily or weekly intervals+ Display 10, 20, 60 or 90 sessions at once+ View your stockâs performance with:  - MACD  - RSI  - Williams %R  - SMA/EMA  - Parabolic SAR  - Stochastic OscillatorWe want to hear your comments and constructive feedback. Please email us at feedback@candlestixapp.com and let us know what you think!Thanks for trying Candlestix and please donât forget to rate our app!Keywords: Stocks, Stock Chart, Technical Analysis, Candlestick, Candle Stick Charting

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Is there any way you could allow us to sync with our Google finance or yahoo finance portfolios? That would make this app even 10x better than it already is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow loading charts
reviews.comment: Love the app but have to wait 20-30 seconds on avg. For each chart to load per stock. Very time consuming if your looking at a lot of stocks. If this issue gets resolved,  an easy 5 star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice graphics but a bit slow
reviews.comment: the app is very nice and looks very attractive, but rendering of the graphs is slow. Also I suggest that the swipe action for graphs should be switched so left-right switches time frames, and up-down switches stocks. Other than that it is a very good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RSI calculation is way off
reviews.comment: this is a very good app, but haven\'t updated for some time. another problem is the RSI is way off. compared with google and yahoo finance data, it is lower by 5-12 points, please fix it. also, the line color needs to be modified so that it is more clear when overlapped.
reviews.author: huidong zhang

reviews.title: Solid charting app
reviews.comment: This is the best stock charting app I\'ve found for Android. Charts are clean and there are several common indicators available. Ads are unobtrusive. My only criticism is speed - it takes approx. 2-3 seconds to load the main menu and every chart, which is kind of laggy for a modern Android device. I would love to see trend line functionality added - that would get me to pay for the ad-free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CANDLESTIX FOR DESKTOP AND LAPTOP!
reviews.comment: CANDLESTIX APP FOR MY ANDROID PHONE IS EXCELLENT!!!!  I HOPE YOU GUYS MAKE A CANDLESTIX PROGRAM FOR DESKTOP AND LAPTOP COMPUTERS!!
reviews.author: Paul Baynton

reviews.title: review
reviews.comment: I love this app!  My only complaint is the 1 minute and 5 minute charts are useless for trading.  It\'s too hard to really tell what\'s going on.  Get rid of them and replace then with a 15 minute and an hourly chart, those are what I use to start and get out of positions.  You do that and this will be the best app ever created!
reviews.author: Steven Bulger

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This is really nice but kinda slow. Btw for next update can you allow offline charts and change background colour, candle stick colour etc.
reviews.author: Andrew Dsouza

reviews.title: Very buggy
reviews.comment: Almost impossible to use. I want to buy it but free version crashes all the time.
reviews.author: Serguei Sokolov

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: but can u color MACD? positive green and negative red?
reviews.author: Icu Zhou

reviews.title: I think this app is pretty awesome
reviews.comment: Yup seems pretty fast to me. Others it says its slow but I think it\'s just fine
reviews.author: Curt Finch

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent technical analysis. Different colour for each indicator will make it perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes a lot
reviews.comment: Nice charts, but crashes frequently!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Den
reviews.comment: This is great! The only thing holdilng me from purchasing the unlock key is that I can\'t find how to delete the stock?
reviews.author: Denys S

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This is a beautiful app.. charts render very quickly.. some great indicators
reviews.author: Andy Bird

reviews.title: Good potential,  but buggy
reviews.comment: Crashes often.  Ads cover last item in list.  Too many details in list,  so cant get overview.  Wish there would be options between 5min and 1day, fx 15min and 1h. No zoom.  ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best candle app
reviews.comment: Best candle stick app no question
reviews.author: Hunter Shankle

reviews.title: Absolutely great except for..
reviews.comment: Stochastic chart..its not shown in the correct way..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Arron Schaar

reviews.title: Pretty and useful
reviews.comment: Good app.
reviews.author: A Google User
